pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Supporting the 'VGAM' Package // Data sets to accompany the VGAM package. These are used to illustrate vector generalized linear and additive models (VGLMs/VGAMs), and associated models (Reduced-Rank VGLMs, Quadratic RR-VGLMs, Row-Column Interaction Models, and constrained and unconstrained ordination models in ecology.
